GK19danddk1u:2: mithilām apraviśyaiva bahiḥ kva=cin maṭhi kāyā
GK19danddk1u:5: tasyās tu maddarśanād eva kim apy ābaddhadhāram
GK19danddk1u:7: ' kim etad amba kathaya kāraṇam ' iti pṛṣṭā
GK19danddk1u:10: tasya khalu magadharājo rājahamsaḥ paraṃ mitram
GK19danddk1u:17: tasminn eva ca samaye mālavena magadharājasya mahaj
GK19danddk1u:35: sā tv ahaṃ mohasuptā kena api
GK19danddk1u:39: vyākulībhavāmi tāvan mamaiva duhitā saha yūnā kena
GK19danddk1u:44: kena api vanacareṇa vraṇaviropaṇam svasthāyāś ca
GK19danddk1u:48: vivikte vipine svaśiraḥ kartanodyamam anena yūnā
GK19danddk1u:51: sa tu pṛṣṭo maithilendrasyaiva ko 'pi sevakaḥ
GK19danddk1u:53: saha tena bhartur antikam upasṛtya putravṛttā ntena
GK19danddk1u:56: sa ca rājā diṣṭadoṣāj jyeṣṭhaputraiś ciraṃ
GK19danddk1u:60: dagdhā punar aham asminn api vārddhake hatajīvitam
GK19danddk1u:65: tau ced rājaputrau nirupadravāv eva avardhiṣyetām
GK19danddk1u:67: tayoś ca sator na dāyādā narendrasya
GK19danddk1u:69: śrutvā ca tāpasīgiram aham api pravṛddhabāṣpo
GK19danddk1u:71: nanv asti kaś cin munis tvayā tadavasthayā
GK19danddk1u:80: anujāḥ punar atibahavaḥ tair api ghaṭante
GK19danddk1u:82: māṃ tu na kaś=cid ihatya īdṛktayā jano jānāti /
GK19danddk1u:83: pitarāv api tāvan māṃ na samvidāte kim utetare /
GK19danddk1u:84: tad enam artham upāyena sādhayiṣyāmi ' ity agādiṣam /
GK19danddk1u:85: sā tu vṛddhā saruditaṃ pariṣvajya muhuḥ śirasy
GK19danddk1u:90: adyaiva prahāravarmaṇy adhi videhā jātāḥ yataḥ
GK19danddk1u:93: aho mahad bhāgadheyaṃ devyāḥ priyamvadāyāḥ ' iti
GK19danddk1u:97: acintayaṃ ca - 'vinopadhinā ayam artho na sādhyaḥ /
GK19danddk1u:100: kiñ=cij jālam ācareyam ' iti cintayaty eva mayi
GK19danddk1u:110: tāṃ ca avekṣya sā me dhātrī
GK19danddk1u:113: ayam asāv akṛpayā mayā vane parityaktaḥ punar apy
GK19danddk1u:115: sā tu harṣanirbharanipīḍitā ciraṃ prarudya bahu
GK19danddk1u:120: ca apsaraso 'py atikrāntā patim abhibhūya vartate /
GK19danddk1u:130: api prayatnena anviṣya prakāśayantī mānam asyā
GK19danddk1u:132: punar idam ambām avocam -- ' ittham eva tvayā apy
GK19danddk1u:134: pratyahaṃ ca yad yat tatra vṛttaṃ tad asmi
GK19danddk1u:139: te ca tam arthaṃ tathaiva anvatiṣṭhatām /
GK19danddk1u:140: keṣucid dineṣu gateṣv ācaṣṭa māṃ madambā --
GK19danddk1u:144: punar aham abhilikhyātmanaḥ pratikṛtim ' iyam amuṣmai
GK19danddk1u:146: nītāṃ caināṃ nirvarṇya sā niyatam evaṃ vakṣyati
GK19danddk1u:147: -- ' nanv asti kaś cid īdṛśākāraḥ pumān ' iti /
GK19danddk1u:148: pratibrūhy enām -- ' yadi syāt tataḥ kim ' iti /
GK19danddk1u:149: tasya yad uttaraṃ sā dāsyati tad aham asmi
GK19danddk1u:151: sā ' tathā ' iti rājakulam upasaṅkramya pratinivṛttā
GK19danddk1u:158: na ca tam avaimi ya īdṛśam ihatyo nirmimīte /
GK19danddk1u:159: kenedam ālikhitam ' ity ādṛtavatī vyāhṛtavatī ca /
GK19danddk1u:162: bhagavān makaraketur apy evaṃ sundara iti na śakyam
GK19danddk1u:165: kvacid īdṛ śam api rūpaṃ daivaśaktyā sambhavet /
GK19danddk1u:168: mahākulīnaś ca kaś=cit samnihitaḥ syāt sa kiṃ
GK19danddk1u:171: śarīraṃ dṛdayaṃ jīvitam iti sarvam idam alpam
GK19danddk1u:174: na ced ayaṃ vipralambhas tasya amuṣya
GK19danddk1u:182: gataś ca asau kāmaśaraikalakṣya tāṃ mām
GK19danddk1u:188: sādṛśyaṃ ca svam anena svayam eva abhilikhya
GK19danddk1u:190: eṣa ced artho niścitas tasya amuṣya
GK19danddk1u:195: tayā tu kiñ=cid iva dhyātvā punar abhihitam - ' amba
GK19danddk1u:198: mama tātasya rājñā prahāravarmaṇā saha mahatī
GK19danddk1u:200: mātuś ca me mānavatyāḥ priyavayasyā devī
GK19danddk1u:202: tābhyāṃ punar ajātāpatyābhyām eva kṛtaḥ samayo
GK19danddk1u:213: na atirocate me eṣa bhartā viśeṣataś caiṣu
GK19danddk1u:224: ayogyaś ca pumān avajñātuṃ ca pravṛttaḥ /
GK19danddk1u:234: anena amuṣya pade pratiṣṭhāpya tam eva atyantam
GK19danddk1u:252: vyacītaraṃ ca - ' siddhaprāya eva ayam arthaḥ /
GK19danddk1u:257: vyatikramaḥ kṛtas tad api pāpaṃ nirhṛtya kiyatyā
GK19danddk1u:259: api tv etad ākarṇya devo rājavāhanaḥ suhṛdo vā
GK19danddk1u:260: kiṃ nu vakṣyanti ' iti cintāparādhīna eva nidrayā
GK19danddk1u:263: āha sma ca - ' saumya upahāravarman mā sma te
GK19danddk1u:268: sā ca kadā=cin madviloḍanā=sahiṣṇur mām aśapat -
GK19danddk1u:270: aśapyata mayā ca - ' yatheha bahubhogyā tathā
GK19danddk1u:271: prāpya api mānuṣyakam an=ekasādhāraṇī bhava ' iti /
GK19danddk1u:272: abhyarthitaś ca anayā ' ekapūrvāṃ punas tvām
GK19danddk1u:274: tad ayam artho bhavya eva bhavatā nir=āśaṅkyaḥ ' iti /
GK19danddk1u:287: śāyitayā ca parikhāṃ sthāpitayā ca prākārabhittim
GK19danddk1u:321: sā ca subhrūr a=suṣīmakāmā śanair upetya tatra
GK19danddk1u:327: ayi hṛdaya kim idam a=kāryaṃ kāryavad adhyasya
GK19danddk1u:329: bhagavan pañcabāṇakas tava aparādhaḥ kṛto mayā
GK19danddk1u:330: yad evaṃ dahasi na ca bhasmīkaroṣi ' iti /
GK19danddk1u:332: nanu bahv aparāddhaṃ bhavatyā cittajanmano yad
GK19danddk1u:347: ataḥ sthānae eva tvāṃ dunoti mīnaketuḥ /
GK19danddk1u:348: māṃ punar an=aparādham adhikam āyāsayatīty eṣa
GK19danddk1u:350: tat prasīda sundari jīvaya māṃ jīvanauṣadhibhir
GK19danddk1u:364: punar aham uṣṇam āyataṃ ca niḥśvasya
GK19danddk1u:368: aśrumukhī tu sā ' yadi prayāsi nātha prayātam eṣa
GK19danddk1u:374: avādiṣaṃ ca tām -- ' ayi mugdhe kaḥ sacetanaḥ
GK19danddk1u:380: ācakṣva ca - ' kim iyam ākṛ tiḥ puruṣasaundaryasya
GK19danddk1u:382: ' bāḍham ārūḍhā ' iti nūnam asau vakṣyati /
GK19danddk1u:383: brūhi bhūyaḥ -- ' yady evam asti kā api tāpasī
GK19danddk1u:387: so 'sti tādṛśo mantro yena tvam upoṣitā parvaṇi
GK19danddk1u:395: āliṅget iyam ākṛ tir amum upasaṅkrāmet /
GK19danddk1u:397: yadi bhavatyai bhavatpriyāya caivaṃ roceta na ca
GK19danddk1u:399: vapuś ced idaṃ tava abhimataṃ saha
GK19danddk1u:401: saṃpradhārya teṣām apy anumate karmaṇy abhimukhena
GK19danddk1u:415: śrutvedaṃ tvadvacaḥ sa yad vadiṣyati tan mahyam
GK19danddk1u:419: sā ' tathā ' iti śāstropadeśam iva maduktam ādṛtya
GK19danddk1u:422: aham api yathāpraveśaṃ nirgatya svam evāvāsam
GK19danddk1u:424: atha sā mattakāśinī tathā tam artham anvatiṣṭhat /
GK19danddk1u:435: yady evaṃ bhāvi na anyad ataḥ param asti kiñ=cid
GK19danddk1u:443: āhutīnāṃ ca parimalaḥ pavanānusārī diśi diśi
GK19danddk1u:445: praśānte ca sahasā dhūmodgame tasminn aham aviśam /
GK19danddk1u:447: āliṅgya ca māṃ sasmitaṃ samabhyadhatta -- ' dhūrta
GK19danddk1u:452: evaṃ sundaro hi tvam apsarasām api spṛhaṇīyo
GK19danddk1u:454: madhukara iva nisargacapalo yatra kva=cid āsajjati
GK19danddk1u:456: tena tu me pādayor nipatya abhihitam -- ' rambhoru
GK19danddk1u:458: manasā api na cintayeyam itaḥ param itaranārīm /
GK19danddk1u:460: tad aham īdṛśena vaivāhikena nepathyena tvām
GK19danddk1u:473: yāvad ahaṃ nirgatya sādhayeyaṃ sādhyaṃ samyak iti
GK19danddk1u:481: tiṣṭhantam abravam - ' brūhi satyaṃ bhūyo 'pi me
GK19danddk1u:483: na ced anena rūpeṇa matsapatnīr abhiramayiṣyasi
GK19danddk1u:485: sa tadaiva devy eveyam nopadhiḥ iti
GK19danddk1u:487: smitvā punar mayoktam - ' kiṃ vā śapathena /
GK19danddk1u:492: so 'bravīt - ' asti baddho matpituḥ kanīyān bhrātā
GK19danddk1u:507: ittham idam aciraprastutaṃ rahasyam ity ākarṇya tam '
GK19danddk1u:515: avalambya gatvā tadgṛham anujñayā asyāḥ sarvāṇy
GK19danddk1u:516: antaḥpurāṇy āhūya sadya eva sevāṃ dattavān /
GK19danddk1u:520: copagūhya talpe 'bhiramayann alpām iva tāṃ niśām
GK19danddk1u:523: uṣasi snātvā kṛtamaṅgalo mantribhiḥ saha samagacche /
GK19danddk1u:524: tāmś ca abravam -- ' āryāḥ rūpeṇaiva saha
GK19danddk1u:526: ya eṣa viṣānnena hantuṃ cintitaḥ pitā me sa
GK19danddk1u:527: muktvā svam etad rājyaṃ bhūya eva grāhayitavyaḥ /
GK19danddk1u:529: na hy asti pitṛvadhāt paraṃ pātakam ' iti /
GK19danddk1u:534: ato muṣṭivadhaḥ sasyavadho vā yadotpadyate tadā
GK19danddk1u:538: mahārhaṃ vajravastu mā astu me labhyaṃ
GK19danddk1u:543: nināśayiṣitaḥ so 'pi pitari me prakṛtisthe kim iti
GK19danddk1u:544: nāśyeta tat tvayā api tasmin samrambho na kāryaḥ '
GK19danddk1u:546: tae ime sarvam ābhijñānikam upalabhya ' sa eva ayam
GK19danddk1u:547: iti niścinvānā vismayamānāś ca tāṃ mahādevīṃ
GK19danddk1u:549: pitarau niṣkrāmayya svaṃ rājyaṃ pratya pādayan /
GK19danddk1u:550: ahaṃ ca tayā me dhātryā sarvam idaṃ mama ceṣṭitaṃ
GK19danddk1u:559: cobhayam api karaṇīyam eva ' ity alaghunā
GK19danddk1u:569: kiṃ hi buddhimatprayuktaṃ na abhyupaiti śobhām '
GK19danddk1u:584: añjalim ' yā asmin vanaspatau vasati devatā saiva me
GK19danddk1u:589: tataḥ kṣaṇād eva avanidurlabhena sparśena asu
GK19danddk1u:593: ' kathaṃ nv idam ' iti mandamandam unmiṣann upary
GK19danddk1u:614: atarkayaṃ ca - ' kva gatā sā mahāṭavī kuta idam
GK19danddk1u:626: na tāvad eṣā devayoṣā yato mandamandam
GK19danddk1u:637: āgatāḥ samhatā iva avayavāḥ prasnigdhatamā api
GK19danddk1u:648: atha ahaṃ na śakṣyāmi ca anupaśliṣya śayitum /
GK19danddk1u:653: sā api kim apy utkampinā romodbhedavatā
GK19danddk1u:671: ajaniṣṭa me rāgāviṣṭacetaso 'pi kim api nidrā /
GK19danddk1u:674: prabuddhasya ca me saiva mahāṭavī tad eva
GK19danddk1u:678: - ' kim ayaṃ svapnaḥ kiṃ vipralambho vā kim iyam
GK19danddk1u:679: āsurī daivī vā kā api māyā /
GK19danddk1u:681: na aham idaṃ tatvato na avabudhya mokṣyāmi
GK19danddk1u:702: bālam arthapālaṃ nidhāya kathāṃ ca kāñcid
GK19danddk1u:705: ātmajā maṇibhadrasyeti sā aham asmi vo jananī /
GK19danddk1u:718: prasthitāyām eva mayi tvam atra abhyupetya ' prapanno
GK19danddk1u:719: asmi śaraṇam ihatyāṃ devatām ' iti prasuptoasi /
GK19danddk1u:720: evaṃ śāpaduḥkhāviṣṭayā tu mayā tadā na
GK19danddk1u:723: mahāṭavyām ayuktaṃ parityajya gantum iti mayā tvam
GK19danddk1u:725: pratyāsanne ca tasmin devagṛhe punar acintayam -- '
GK19danddk1u:726: katham iha taruṇena anena saha samājaṃ gamiṣyāmi '
GK19danddk1u:735: yāvat kṛtakṛtyā nivarteya ' iti tvāṃ tatra
GK19danddk1u:741: tayā giriduhitrā devyā sasmitam ' ayi bhadre mā
GK19danddk1u:744: gatas te śāpaḥ ity anugṛhītā sadya eva
GK19danddk1u:746: yathāvad abhyajānām - ' kathaṃ matsuta eva ayaṃ
GK19danddk1u:749: pāpayā mayā asminn ajñānād audāsīnyam ācaritam
GK19danddk1u:752: ubhau cemau lakṣyasuptau trapayā sādhvasena vā
GK19danddk1u:763: eṣā ca ahaṃ pitus te pādamūlaṃ pratyupasarpeyam
GK19danddk1u:764: ' iti prāñjaliṃ māṃ bhūyo bhūyaḥ pariṣvajya
GK19danddk1u:770: ahaṃ ca tatra samnihitaḥ kiñcid asmeṣi /
GK19danddk1u:777: so 'pi tajjñaḥ ' kim ajñair ebhir vyutpāditaiḥ /
GK19danddk1u:779: karpūrasahitam uddhṛtya mahyaṃ datvā citrāḥ kathāḥ
GK19danddk1u:787: sakhyam upetya tadahaḥ svagṛhae eva snānabhojanādi
GK19danddk1u:789: anugamya ' smartavyo 'si saty arthe iti mitravad
GK19danddk1u:791: ahaṃ ca gatvā śrāvastīm adhvaśrānto bāhyodyāne
GK19danddk1u:796: sā tv āgatya svahastavartini citrapaṭe likhitaṃ
GK19danddk1u:797: matsadṛśaṃ kim api puṃrūpaṃ māṃ ca paryāyeṇa
GK19danddk1u:800: mayā api tatra citrapaṭe matsādṛśyaṃ paśyatā
GK19danddk1u:811: yadi na doṣo madgṛhe 'dya viśramitum anugrahaḥ
GK19danddk1u:813: ahaṃ ca ' ayi mugdhe naiṣa doṣo guṇa eva ' iti
GK19danddk1u:819: mama abhavan manasi -- ' mahad idam āśāspadam /
GK19danddk1u:821: sakhī rājadārikāyāḥ citrapaṭe ca asminn api
GK19danddk1u:826: ato nūnam anaṅgena sā api rājakanyā tāvatīṃ
GK19danddk1u:837: punas tam ādāya tām api vyājasuptām
GK19danddk1u:843: hṛṣṭayā tu tayā vistarataḥ pṛṣṭaḥ sarvam eva
GK19danddk1u:847: tad ākarṇya ca ' yadi tava sakhyā
GK19danddk1u:851: abhyupagamayya gatvā tad eva kharvaṭaṃ vṛddhaviṭena
GK19danddk1u:856: pratyavādiṣam enam - ' sthānae eva aham āryeṇa
GK19danddk1u:860: tasyāḥ patir apara iva dharmaputro dharmavardhano
GK19danddk1u:862: tasya duhitā pratyādeśa iva śriyaḥ prāṇā iva
GK19danddk1u:868: tvad ṛte netaro 'sti vaidya iti pratyāgato 'smi /
GK19danddk1u:870: ayam ahaṃ parivartitastrīveṣas te kanyā nāma
GK19danddk1u:872: anugataś ca mayā tvam upagamya dharmāsanagataṃ
GK19danddk1u:874: jātamātrāyāṃ tv asyāṃ janany asyāḥ saṃsthitā /
GK19danddk1u:875: mātā ca pitā ca bhūtvā aham eva vyavardhayam /
GK19danddk1u:876: etadartham eva vidyāmayaṃ śulkam arjituṃ gato
GK19danddk1u:879: tasmai ceyam anumatā dātum itarasmai na yogyā /
GK19danddk1u:882: tena tam ānīya pāṇim asyā grāhayitvā tasmin
GK19danddk1u:888: yadi vṛddhaṃ brāhmaṇam adhītinam agatim atithiṃ ca
GK19danddk1u:895: gatas tu bhavān āgāmini māsi phālgune
GK19danddk1u:901: sa khalv aham anabhiśaṅka evaitāvantaṃ kālaṃ
GK19danddk1u:902: saha abhivihṛtya rājakanyayā bhūyas tasminn utsave
GK19danddk1u:906: apanītadārikāveṣo jāmātā nāma bhūtvā tvām eva
GK19danddk1u:909: anāsādayantī ' tayā vinā na bhokṣye ' iti rudaty
GK19danddk1u:911: tanmūle ca mahati kolāhale krandatsu parijaneṣu rudatsu
GK19danddk1u:914: āsthānīm etya māṃ sthāpayitvā vakṣyasi - ' deva sa
GK19danddk1u:915: eṣa me jāmātā tava arhati śrībhujārādhanam /
GK19danddk1u:916: adhītī caturṣv āmnāyeṣu gṛhītī ṣaṭsv aṅgeṣu
GK19danddk1u:925: na asya doṣam aṇīyāṃsam apy upalabhe /
GK19danddk1u:927: tan mādṛśasya brāhmaṇamātrasya na labhya eṣa
GK19danddk1u:930: āśramaṃ saṅkrameyam yadi devaḥ sādhu manyate ' iti /
GK19danddk1u:939: sa tāvad eva tvatpādayor nipatya sāmātyo
GK19danddk1u:959: athedānīm atra bhavān praviśatu iti mitraguptam
GK19danddk1u:972: aprā kṣaṃ ca -- ' bhadra ko nāma ayam utsavaḥ kim
GK19danddk1u:973: arthaṃ vā samārabdhaḥ kena vā nimittenotsavam
GK19danddk1u:980: anayā ca kila asmai pratiśayitāya svapne samādiṣṭam
GK19danddk1u:987: yaṃ ca abhilaṣet sā amuṣmai deyā /
GK19danddk1u:992: sā adya kanyā kandukāvatī nāma somāpīḍāṃ
GK19danddk1u:994: tasyās tu sakhī candrasenā nāma dhātreyikā mama
GK19danddk1u:1002: asminn eva kṣaṇe kim api nūpurakvaṇitam upātiṣṭhat /
GK19danddk1u:1007: aśamsac ca -- ' saiṣā me prāṇasamā yadviraho
GK19danddk1u:1009: idaṃ ca me jīvitam apaharatā rājaputreṇa
GK19danddk1u:1011: na ca śakṣyāmi rājasūnur ity amuṣmin pāpam
GK19danddk1u:1015: sā tu paryaśrumukhī samabhyadhāt -- ' mā sma nātha
GK19danddk1u:1017: yas tvam uttamāt sārthavāhād arthadāsād utpadya
GK19danddk1u:1020: prakhyāpito 'si tasmims tvayy uparate yady ahaṃ
GK19danddk1u:1021: jīveyaṃ nṛśamso veśa iti samarthayeyaṃ lokavādam /
GK19danddk1u:1022: ato 'dyaiva naya mām īpsitaṃ deśam ' iti /
GK19danddk1u:1023: sa tu mām abhyadhatta -- ' bhadra bhavaddṛṣṭeṣu
GK19danddk1u:1030: api tu na ced iha yuvayoḥ sukhanivāsakāraṇaṃ
GK19danddk1u:1031: kam=apy upāyam utpādayituṃ śaknuyāṃ tato 'ham eva
GK19danddk1u:1040: aham asyāḥ sakāśavartinī bhaveyam ' ity ayāsīt /
GK19danddk1u:1044: atiṣṭhac ca sā sadya eva mama hṛdaye /
GK19danddk1u:1045: na mayā anyena vā antarāle dṛṣṭā /
GK19danddk1u:1046: citrīyāviṣṭacit taś ca acintayam -- ' kim iyaṃ
GK19danddk1u:1049: tasyāḥ kila haste vinyastaṃ kamalam asyās tu hasta
GK19danddk1u:1051: bhuktapūrvā tu sā purātanena pumsā pūrvarājaiś ca
GK19danddk1u:1052: asyāḥ punar anavadyam ayātayāmaṃ ca yauvanam ' iti
GK19danddk1u:1112: vihṛtānte ca abhivandya devīṃ manasā me
GK19danddk1u:1117: svahṛdayam iva matsamīpe preritaṃ pratinivṛttaṃ na
GK19danddk1u:1118: vety ālokayantī saha sakhībhiḥ kumārīpuram agamat /
GK19danddk1u:1122: sāyaṃ copasṛtya candrasenā rahasi māṃ praṇipatya
GK19danddk1u:1125: ācaṣṭa ca hṛṣṭaḥ kośadāsaḥ -- ' bhūyāsam evam
GK19danddk1u:1127: mayā tu sasmitam abhihitam -- ' sakhe kim etad āśāsyam /
GK19danddk1u:1132: tayā tu smerayā asmi kathitaḥ -- ' so 'yam
GK19danddk1u:1134: asminn eva janmani mānuṣaṃ vapur apanīya
GK19danddk1u:1141: so 'yam artho viditabhāvayā mayā svamātre tayā ca
GK19danddk1u:1143: viditārthas tu pārthivas tvayā duhituḥ pāṇiṃ
GK19danddk1u:1147: tvadāyatte ca rājye na alam eva tvām atikramya mām
GK19danddk1u:1150: ' iti mām āmantrya priyaṃ copagūhya pratyayāsīt /
GK19danddk1u:1164: pratibuddhaṃ ca sahasā samabhyadhāt -- ' ayi durmate
GK19danddk1u:1168: tvaṃ kila abhilaṣito varākyā kandukavatyā tava kila
GK19danddk1u:1171: ity uktvā pārśvacaraṃ puruṣam ekam ālokya
GK19danddk1u:1173: sa tu labdharājya iva atihṛṣṭaḥ ' deva yad
GK19danddk1u:1189: tāvad atijavā naukāḥ śvāna iva varāham
GK19danddk1u:1193: tān aham agatīn avasīdataḥ samāśvāsya alapiṣam --
GK19danddk1u:1195: ayam aham avasādayāmi vaḥ sapatnān ' iti /
GK19danddk1u:1204: taṃ ca aham avabudhya jātavrīḍam abravam -- ' tāta
GK19danddk1u:1206: te tu sāmyātrikā madīyenaiva śṛṅkhalena tam
GK19danddk1u:1209: durvārā tu sā naur ananukālavātanunnā dūram
GK19danddk1u:1210: abhipatya kam api dvīpaṃ nibiḍam āśliṣṭavatī /
GK19danddk1u:1211: tatra ca svādu pānīyam edhāmsi kandamūlaphalāni ca
GK19danddk1u:1220: taruvanābhogaḥ ity atṛptatarayā dṛśā bahu bahu
GK19danddk1u:1230: nirbhayena ca mayā so 'bhyadhīyata -- ' saumya so
GK19danddk1u:1236: so 'brūta -- ' na ced bravīṣi praśnān aśnāmi tvām
GK19danddk1u:1251: teṣu jīvatsu na vavarṣa varṣāṇi dvādaśa
GK19danddk1u:1253: kṣīṇasāraṃ sasyam oṣadhyo vandhyāḥ na phalavanto
GK19danddk1u:1268: ayaṃ kaniṣṭho dhanyakaḥ priyāṃ svām attum
GK19danddk1u:1269: akṣamas tayā saha tasyām eva niśy apāsarat /
GK19danddk1u:1279: puṣṭaṃ ca tam udriktadhātum ekadā mṛgānveṣaṇāya
GK19danddk1u:1280: ca prayāte dhanyake sā dhūminī riramsayopātiṣṭhat /
GK19danddk1u:1282: nivṛttaṃ ca patim udakābhyarthinam ' uddhṛtya kūpāt
GK19danddk1u:1283: piba rujati me śiraḥ śirorogaḥ ' ity udañcanaṃ
GK19danddk1u:1285: udañcantaṃ ca taṃ kūpād apaḥ kṣaṇāt pṛṣṭhato
GK19danddk1u:1287: taṃ ca vikalaṃ skandhenoduhya deśād deśāntaraṃ
GK19danddk1u:1295: sā dhūminī ' yena me patir vikalīkṛtaḥ sa durātmā
GK19danddk1u:1296: ayam ' iti tasya sādhoś citravadham ajñena rājñā
GK19danddk1u:1299: nīyamānaḥ saśeṣatvād āyuṣaḥ ' yo mayā vikalī
GK19danddk1u:1300: kṛto 'bhimato bhikṣuḥ sa cen me pāpam ācakṣīta
GK19danddk1u:1301: yukto me daṇḍaḥ ' ity adīnam adhikṛtaṃ jagāda /
GK19danddk1u:1302: ' ko doṣaḥ ' ity upanīya darśite 'muṣmin sa
GK19danddk1u:1309: tad bravīmi -- ' strī hṛdayaṃ krūram ' iti /
GK19danddk1u:1317: tat kathaṃ nu guṇavad vindeyaṃ kalatram ' iti /
GK19danddk1u:1324: dṛṣṭvā sa kila sma bravīti -- ' bhadre śaknoṣi kim
GK19danddk1u:1327: sa hasitāvadhūto gṛhād gṛhaṃ praviśya abhramat /
GK19danddk1u:1328: ekadā tu śibiṣu kāverītīrapattane saha pitṛbhyām
GK19danddk1u:1333: khalu kanyakāyāḥ sarvae eva avayavā na
GK19danddk1u:1334: atisthūlā na atikṛśā na atihrasvā na
GK19danddk1u:1338: itau karau samagulphasandhī māmsalāv aśirālau ca
GK19danddk1u:1339: aṅghrī jaṅghe ca anu pūrvavṛtte pīvarorugraste
GK19danddk1u:1366: āsajjati ca me hṛdayam asyām eva /
GK19danddk1u:1370: ' bhadre kac=cid asti kauśalaṃ śāliprasthena anena
GK19danddk1u:1373: tasya hastāt prasthamātraṃ dhānyam ādāya kva=cid
GK19danddk1u:1376: sā kanyā tān gandhaśālīn saṅkṣudya mātrayā
GK19danddk1u:1381: jagāda ca dhātrīm -- ' mātaḥ ebhis tuṣair arthino
GK19danddk1u:1401: darvyā ca avaghaṭṭya mātrayā parivartya samapakveṣu
GK19danddk1u:1408: tathā anuṣṭhite ca tayā dvitrān upadamśān
GK19danddk1u:1421: sā tu tāṃ peyām eva agre samupāharat /
GK19danddk1u:1447: parituṣṭaś ca vidhivad upayamya kanyāṃ ninye /
GK19danddk1u:1451: patiṃ ca daivatam iva muktatandrā paryacarat /
GK19danddk1u:1454: tadguṇavaśīkṛtaś ca bhartā sarvam eva kuṭumbaṃ
GK19danddk1u:1463: tāṃ kila madhumatyāḥ samupāgamya balabhadro nāma
GK19danddk1u:1471: tāṃ ca durbhagāṃ tadāprabhṛty eva ' neyaṃ
GK19danddk1u:1472: ratnavatī nimbavatī ceyam iti svajanaḥ parajanaś ca
GK19danddk1u:1474: gate ca kasmimś=cit kāle sā tv anutapyamānā ' kā me
GK19danddk1u:1475: gatiḥ iti vimṛśantī kām api vṛddhapravrājikāṃ
GK19danddk1u:1489: na cet tyajeyam adyaiva niṣprayojanān prāṇān /
GK19danddk1u:1490: ā virāmāc ca me rahasyaṃ nāśrāvyam ' iti
GK19danddk1u:1497: yady eva asi nirviṇṇā tapaś cara tvaṃ
GK19danddk1u:1506: atha asau kathañ=cit kṣaṇam adhomukhī dhyātvā
GK19danddk1u:1508: eva daivataṃ vanitānām viśeṣataś ca kulajānām /
GK19danddk1u:1522: atha tam ādāya tasya haste datvā vakṣyasi -- ' putra
GK19danddk1u:1529: sa tathokto niyatam unmukhībhūya tām eva
GK19danddk1u:1534: asau kṛtasaṅketo deśāntaram ādāya māṃ gamiṣyati
GK19danddk1u:1540: sā tu tāpasī vārtām āpādayat -- ' mandena mayā
GK19danddk1u:1541: nirnimittam upekṣitā ratnavatī śvaśurau ca paribhūtau
GK19danddk1u:1545: nūnam asau tena nītā vyaktiś ca acirād bhaviṣyati
GK19danddk1u:1549: ratnavatī tu mārge kāñ=cit paṇyadāsīṃ saṅgṛhya
GK19danddk1u:1556: tatas tāṃ prathamadāsīṃ ' na karma karoṣi
GK19danddk1u:1557: dṛṣṭaṃ muṣṇāsi apriyaṃ bravīṣi ' iti paruṣam
GK19danddk1u:1567: bhītaṃ ca balabhadram adhijagāda ratnavatī -- ' na
GK19danddk1u:1572: na cet pratītha praṇidhiṃ prahiṇuta asyā
GK19danddk1u:1581: tad bravīmi -- ' kāmo nāma saṅkalpaḥ ' iti /
GK19danddk1u:1583: so 'ham abravam -- ' asti śūraseneṣu mathurā nāma
GK19danddk1u:1585: tatra kaś=cit kulaputraḥ kalāsu gaṇikāsu ca
GK19danddk1u:1590: sa caikadā kasya=cid āgantoś citrakarasya haste
GK19danddk1u:1594: sa ca tam abravīt -- ' bhadra viruddham ivaitat
GK19danddk1u:1603: tad iyaṃ vṛddhasya kasya=cid vaṇijo na
GK19danddk1u:1607: sa tam abhipraśasya aśamsat -- ' satyam idam /
GK19danddk1u:1619: apy arhantikāṃ nāma śramaṇikām upāsāñ cakre /
GK19danddk1u:1620: tanmukhena ca nimbavatīm upāmśu mantrayām āsa /
GK19danddk1u:1627: kulavadhūnāṃ śīlapātane ghaṭatae iti kva ghaṭate /
GK19danddk1u:1628: etad api tvam atyudārayā samṛddhyā rūpeṇa
GK19danddk1u:1630: cāpalaṃ spṛṣṭaṃ na veti parīkṣā kṛtā /
GK19danddk1u:1633: bhartā tu bhavatyāḥ kena=cid graheṇa adhiṣṭhitaḥ
GK19danddk1u:1636: na ca śakyaṃ tasya vighnam apratikṛtya apatyam
GK19danddk1u:1640: kasya=cin mantravādinaś channam eva haste caraṇam
GK19danddk1u:1648: naktaṃ māṃ vṛkṣavāṭikāṃ praveśya tām api
GK19danddk1u:1650: tāvataiva tvayā aham anugṛhīto bhave yam ' iti /
GK19danddk1u:1657: sā tu sāndratrāsā svam eva durnayaṃ garhamāṇā
GK19danddk1u:1663: sa dhūrtaḥ ' vikreṣye ' iti tena nūpureṇa tam
GK19danddk1u:1665: sa dṛṣṭvā mama gṛhiṇyā evaiṣa nūpuraḥ katham
GK19danddk1u:1666: ayam upalabdhas tvayā ' iti tam abruvāṇaṃ nirbandhena
GK19danddk1u:1668: sa tu ' vaṇiggrāmasya agre vakṣyāmi ' iti sthito
GK19danddk1u:1672: sā ca salajjaṃ sasādhvasaṃ ca ' adya rātrau
GK19danddk1u:1676: sa punar ayaṃ dvitīyaḥ ' ity aparaṃ prā hiṇot /
GK19danddk1u:1677: anayā ca vārtayā amuṃ puraskṛtya sa vaṇig
GK19danddk1u:1679: sa ca anuyukto dhūrtaḥ savinayam āvedayat -- '
GK19danddk1u:1680: viditam eva khalu vo yathā ahaṃ yuṣmadājñayā
GK19danddk1u:1683: daheyur api śavānīti niśāsv api śmaśānam
GK19danddk1u:1688: arthalobhāt tu nigṛhya bhayaṃ sā saṅgṛhītā /
GK19danddk1u:1694: vimarśe ca tasyāḥ śākinī tvam aikamatyena paurāṇām
GK19danddk1u:1696: bhartrā ca parityaktā tasminn eva śmaśāne bahu vilapya
GK19danddk1u:1701: teṣv asiddheṣu punar ayam upāyo yāvajjīvam
GK19danddk1u:1704: asmai dāsajanāya ' iti muhur muhuś caraṇayor
GK19danddk1u:1707: tad idam uktam -- ' duṣkarasādhanaṃ prajñā ' iti /
GK19danddk1u:1708: sa cedam ākarṇya brahmarākṣaso mām apūpujat /
GK19danddk1u:1712: ahaṃ tu ' kiṃ nv idam ' ity uccakṣur ālokayan
GK19danddk1u:1715: katham apaharaty akāmām api striyam anācāro
GK19danddk1u:1718: sa tu matsambandhī brahmarākṣasaḥ ' tiṣṭha tiṣṭha
GK19danddk1u:1719: pāpa kva apaharasi ' iti bhartsayann utthāya
GK19danddk1u:1734: sā hi mayā samāśvāsyamānā tiryaṅ mām abhinirūpya
GK19danddk1u:1739: tvaṃ kila samudramadhye majjitaḥ pāpena madbhrātrā
GK19danddk1u:1740: bhīmadhanvanā iti śrutvā sakhījanaṃ parijanaṃ ca
GK19danddk1u:1743: tatra ca mām acakamata kāmarūpa eṣa rākṣasādhamaḥ /
GK19danddk1u:1747: ahaṃ ca daivāt tavaiva jīvita īśasya haste patitā /
GK19danddk1u:1749: śrutvā ca tayā saha avaruhya nāvam adhyāroham /
GK19danddk1u:1750: muktā ca nauḥ prativātapreritā tām eva
GK19danddk1u:1753: ' tanayasya ca tanayāyāś ca nāśād ananyāpatyas
GK19danddk1u:1761: atha aham asmai rājñe yathāvṛttam ākhyāya
